verses.verse: Now the Philistines <WH6430> fought <WH3898> <WH8737> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>: and the men <WH582> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> fled <WH5127> <WH8799> from before <WH6440> the Philistines <WH6430>, and fell down <WH5307> <WH8799> slain <WH2491> in mount <WH2022> Gilboa <WH1533>.

And the Philistines <WH6430> followed hard <WH1692> <WH8686> upon Saul <WH7586> and upon his sons <WH1121>; and the Philistines <WH6430> slew <WH5221> <WH8686> Y'honatan <WH3083>, and Abinadab <WH41>, and Malchishua <WH4444>, Saul's <WH7586> sons <WH1121>.

And the battle <WH4421> went sore <WH3513> <WH8799> against Saul <WH7586>, and the archers <WH3384> <WH8688> <WH582> <WH7198> hit <WH4672> <WH8799> him; and he was sore <WH3966> wounded <WH2342> <WH8799> of the archers <WH3384> <WH8688> <WH582> <WH7198>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> Saul <WH7586> unto his armourbearer <WH5375> <WH8802> <WH3627>, Draw <WH8025> <WH8798> thy sword <WH2719>, and thrust me through <WH1856> <WH8798> therewith; lest these uncircumcised <WH6189> come <WH935> <WH8799> and thrust me through <WH1856> <WH8804>, and abuse <WH5953> <WH8694> me. But his armourbearer <WH5375> <WH8802> <WH3627> would <WH14> <WH8804> not; for he was sore <WH3966> afraid <WH3372> <WH8804>. Therefore Saul <WH7586> took <WH3947> <WH8799> a sword <WH2719>, and fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon it.

And when his armourbearer <WH5375> <WH8802> <WH3627> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that Saul <WH7586> was dead <WH4191> <WH8804>, he fell <WH5307> <WH8799> likewise upon his sword <WH2719>, and died <WH4191> <WH8799> with him.
So Saul <WH7586> died <WH4191> <WH8799>, and his three <WH7969> sons <WH1121>, and his armourbearer <WH5375> <WH8802> <WH3627>, and all his men <WH582>, that same day <WH3117> together <WH3162>.

And when the men <WH582> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> that were on the other side <WH5676> of the valley <WH6010>, and they that were on the other side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383>, saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that the men <WH582> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> fled <WH5127> <WH8804>, and that Saul <WH7586> and his sons <WH1121> were dead <WH4191> <WH8804>, they forsook <WH5800> <WH8799> the cities <WH5892>, and fled <WH5127> <WH8799>; and the Philistines <WH6430> came <WH935> <WH8799> and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in them.

And it came to pass on the morrow <WH4283>, when the Philistines <WH6430> came <WH935> <WH8799> to strip <WH6584> <WH8763> the slain <WH2491>, that they found <WH4672> <WH8799> Saul <WH7586> and his three <WH7969> sons <WH1121> fallen <WH5307> <WH8802> in mount <WH2022> Gilboa <WH1533>.

And they cut off <WH3772> <WH8799> his head <WH7218>, and stripped off <WH6584> <WH8686> his armour <WH3627>, and sent <WH7971> <WH8762> into the land <WH776> of the Philistines <WH6430> round about <WH5439>, to publish <WH1319> <WH8763> it in the house <WH1004> of their idols <WH6091>, and among the people <WH5971>.

And they put <WH7760> <WH8799> his armour <WH3627> in the house <WH1004> of Ashtaroth <WH6252> <WH8677> <WH1045>: and they fastened <WH8628> <WH8804> his body <WH1472> to the wall <WH2346> of Bethshan <WH1052>.
And when the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Jabeshgilead <WH3003> <WH1568> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> of that which the Philistines <WH6430> had done <WH6213> <WH8804> to Saul <WH7586>;

All the valiant <WH2428> men <WH376> <WH8677> <WH381> arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> all night <WH3915>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> the body <WH1472> of Saul <WH7586> and the bodies <WH1472> of his sons <WH1121> from the wall <WH2346> of Bethshan <WH1052>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> to Jabesh <WH3003>, and burnt <WH8313> <WH8799> them there.
And they took <WH3947> <WH8799> their bones <WH6106>, and buried <WH6912> <WH8799> them under a tree <WH815> at Jabesh <WH3003>, and fasted <WH6684> <WH8799> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>.
